summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 14
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Tuesday, with 16 gaining and three declining.
Bitcoin rose 2.7% to $22,232 by market close.
